name: agenr Memory
description: Local memory layer - injects agenr context at session start

agenrPath.description: Path to agenr CLI entry point (dist/cli.js).

budget.description: Token budget for session-start recall. Default: 2000.

enabled.description: Set false to disable memory injection without uninstalling.

signalMinImportance.description: Minimum importance for mid-session signals (1-10, default: 8). Raise to reduce noise.

signalCooldownMs.description: Minimum ms between signal batches per session (default: 30000). Set 0 to disable cooldown.

signalMaxPerSession.description: Max total signal batches delivered per session lifetime (default: 10). Set 0 to disable.

signalMaxAgeSec.description: Only surface entries created within last N seconds (default: 300). Set 0 to disable age filter.

signalsEnabled.description: Set false to disable mid-session signals without uninstalling.

dbPath.description: Path to agenr DB. Defaults to AGENR_DB_PATH env or ~/.agenr/knowledge.db.
